email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have a vessel available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Rotterdam. The vessel is MV SEA HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 290m. The indicative freight rate is USD 42/MT, CIF terms.

Laycan is 15-20 October 2023. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. USD 42/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you adjust to USD 38/MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's demurrage rate and provide the last three B/Ls?

Best,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for your response. I can lower the rate to USD 40/MT, which is the best I can offer at this time. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata. I will send over the last three B/Ls shortly.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 40/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and send over the B/Ls as soon as possible. Also, could you provide the vessel's IMO compliance documents?

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Great! The laycan remains 15-20 October 2023. I have attached the last three B/Ls and the IMO compliance documents for your review.

[ATTACHMENTS: BL_history.pdf, imo_compliance.pdf]

Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Documents received and reviewed. Everything looks good. Please proceed with the booking as discussed.

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Booking confirmed! Recap attached. Thank you for your business.

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 150,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarao
Discharge Port: Rotterdam
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
Freight: USD 40/MT
Laycan: 15-20 October 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Brokers
